author: Staff Reporter
text:
N. Arunaasalam, Assistant Director, Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), Coimbatore, was awarded the President’s award at the Republic Day celebration this year.

The 1982 Inspector cadre officer has put in 33 years of service in the areas of central excise, customs, narcotics, service tax and in prevention of smuggling of red sanders, drugs and gold. Promoted to the rank of Superintendent in 2000, he served in the Central Excise Commissionerate in Coimbatore. In 2006, he was selected as the first officer of DRI Coimbatore and during his tenure till 2014 he served in the capacity of senior intelligence officer.

After his promotion to the Indian Revenue Service, in November 2014, he was retained as Assistant Director in the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence here.

He received the award at the Republic Day celebration

this year
title: DRI official gets President’s award
